ChunkText: applying for a social security number ssn an ssn is required of any individual in order to get paid in the us.
ContextBefore: sometimes as much as 30 of your paycheck will be taken out for taxes, so please plan accordingly! you are responsible for covering the cost of mandatory fees each semester. some assistantships will cover mandatory fees while others do not. please review your contract carefully so you know if you need to be prepared to pay mandatory fees yourself.
ContextAfter: you can only apply for an ssn after the following: you are physically in the US in f-1 immigration status your sevis immigration record has been activated by isss please note, you cannot begin the process of getting on payroll with your department until you have applied for a social security number.
